LanguageData.StrawRiceBag_RawRice.label: Straw rice bag (Rice)
LanguageData.StrawRiceBag_RawRice.description: A bag fit to burst with rice. Colonists can either unpack it for food, or sell it to merchants at a high price.
LanguageData.StrawRiceBag_RiceMomi.label: Straw rice bag (Momi)
LanguageData.StrawRiceBag_RiceMomi.description: A bag fit to burst with Momi. Colonists can either unpack it for food, or sell it to merchants at a high price.

LanguageData.StrawRiceBag_BrownRice.description: A bag fit to burst with Brown rice. Colonists can either unpack it for food, or sell it to merchants at a high price.
LanguageData.StrawRiceBag_GlutinousRice.label: Straw rice bag (Glutinous rice)
LanguageData.StrawRiceBag_GlutinousRice.description: A bag fit to burst with Glutinous rice. Colonists can either unpack it for food, or sell it to merchants at a high price.
LanguageData.StrawRiceBag_WhiteRice.label: Straw rice bag (White rice)
LanguageData.StrawRiceBag_WhiteRice.description: A bag fit to burst with White rice. Colonists can either unpack it for food, or sell it to merchants at a high price.
